nodes.text: Rekelos was a terrestrial astronomical object. During the High Republic Era, the Jedi Padawan Bell Zettifar witnessed the results of a swarm of Nihil scav droids on Rekelos. By the time of the Galactic Empire, a large city was present on Rekelos. In a cantina on Rekelos, the smuggler Jaxxon T. Tumperakki was confronted by the gangster Scram and the Scram Gang before being pursued by the bounty hunter Dengar. As he tried to escape, Tumperakki was found by Rebel Alliance members Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Chewbacca.
